summary: This is a lightened version of the Deer(Elk) texture from Bellyache's texture pack. I found that because of my lighting mods, wall trophies and the animals themselves were too dark, and decide to upload this quick edit in case anyone else had a similar issue.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=4]Description[/size][/font][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]
This mod is a lightened version of the Deer(Elk) texture from Bellyache's texture pack, for those with lighting mods, ENBs, etc. that make the textures too dark in some circumstances.

This mod changes ONLY the Elk-Deer texture: [b]elkbody.dds[/b]. It does not make changes to the normal map, white elk, or regular/rein deer. This effects the mounted trophies.

The texture used is from the [size=3][b]medium res[/b][/size] pack and is [u]exactly[/u] the same size.

You now can check it out in action in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63243/?]True Elk Of Skyrim[/url].

[size=4]Installation[/size]
Drop into your Data folder and overwrite the existing elkbody.dds
-or-
Install with NMM and say "Yes" to mod changes.

[size=4]Credits[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3621/?]Bellyache's Animals and Creatures Pack[/url] - original texture, and being awesome enough to let people use stuff.[/font]
author: Sunnyemi
